typescript.name: TypeScript
typescript.about: TypeScript is an open-source programming language developed by Microsoft. It is a superset of JavaScript that adds static typing and advanced features to support large application development.

html.name: HTML
html.about: HTML (HyperText Markup Language) is the standard language used to structure and display content on web pages across the internet.

css.name: CSS
css.about: CSS (Cascading Style Sheets) is a styling language used to describe the appearance and formatting of HTML documents, including colors, fonts, layout, and more.

javascript.name: JavaScript
javascript.about: JavaScript is a programming language widely used to create interactive web pages, allowing for DOM manipulation, animations, and asynchronous requests.

nodejs.name: Node.js
nodejs.about: Node.js is a JavaScript runtime environment that allows for server-side application development using an event-driven, non-blocking model for scalability.

express.name: Express
express.about: Express is a minimalist web framework for Node.js, providing a lightweight and flexible structure to build web applications and APIs.

git.name: Git
git.about: Git is a distributed version control system used to track code changes and facilitate collaboration among developers.

github.name: GitHub
github.about: GitHub is a platform that hosts source code, providing project management, version control, and collaboration features for developers.

postman.name: Postman
postman.about: Postman is a collaborative tool for API development, enabling users to create, test, and document APIs efficiently.

datagrip.name: DataGrip
datagrip.about: DataGrip is an IDE developed by JetBrains for databases, offering advanced features for managing, querying, and maintaining databases.

webstorm.name: WebStorm
webstorm.about: WebStorm is a JetBrains IDE specialized for web development, with strong support for JavaScript, TypeScript, and frameworks like React, Angular, and Vue.js.

space.name: Space
space.about: JetBrains Space is an all-in-one platform for project management and team collaboration, featuring code hosting, CI/CD tools, and team communication.

postgresql.name: PostgreSQL
postgresql.about: PostgreSQL is an open-source relational database management system known for its reliability, extensibility, and adherence to SQL standards.

aws_s3.name: Amazon S3
aws_s3.about: Amazon S3 (Simple Storage Service) is an AWS object storage service that enables scalable data storage and retrieval.

aws_ec2.name: Amazon EC2
aws_ec2.about: Amazon EC2 (Elastic Compute Cloud) is an AWS service providing scalable virtual servers to run cloud-based applications.

ZOD.name: Zod
ZOD.about: Zod is a TypeScript schema declaration and validation library that provides strict typing and advanced data validation tools.

github_action.name: GitHub Actions
github_action.about: GitHub Actions is GitHubâ€™s automation service that enables custom workflows for CI/CD, continuous integration, and other automated processes.

sql.name: SQL
sql.about: SQL (Structured Query Language) is a standardized language for managing and manipulating relational databases, used for querying and updating data.

chatgpt.name: ChatGPT
chatgpt.about: ChatGPT is an AI language model developed by OpenAI, capable of generating human-like text based on input prompts.

visual_studio_code.name: Visual Studio Code
visual_studio_code.about: Visual Studio Code is a free, open-source code editor developed by Microsoft, known for its extensions, debugging, and integrated terminal support.

docker.name: Docker
docker.about: Docker is an open platform for developing, shipping, and running applications inside lightweight, portable containers.

mariadb.name: MariaDB
mariadb.about: MariaDB is an open-source relational database management system that is compatible with MySQL and provides powerful database features.

bootstrap.name: Bootstrap
bootstrap.about: Bootstrap is a front-end framework that helps in designing responsive websites quickly with its pre-styled HTML, CSS, and JavaScript components.

java.name: Java
java.about: Java is a high-level, object-oriented programming language widely used for building cross-platform applications, especially server-side applications.

jquery.name: jQuery
jquery.about: jQuery is a fast, small, and feature-rich JavaScript library that simplifies HTML DOM tree traversal and manipulation, event handling, and animation.

mysql.name: MySQL
mysql.about: MySQL is an open-source relational database management system known for its reliability and ease of use in data management.

gitlab.name: GitLab
gitlab.about: GitLab is a DevOps platform that provides version control, CI/CD, and collaborative development tools, all in one platform.

virtualbox.name: VirtualBox
virtualbox.about: VirtualBox is an open-source virtualization software that allows users to run multiple operating systems on a single machine.

intellij.name: IntelliJ IDEA
intellij.about: IntelliJ IDEA is a Java-centric integrated development environment (IDE) by JetBrains, known for its smart code assistance and productivity tools.

c++.name: C++
c++.about: C++ is a powerful general-purpose programming language, an extension of C, widely used in system software, game development, and real-time applications.

c.name: C
c.about: C is a foundational programming language known for its efficiency and flexibility in system programming and low-level applications.

clion.name: CLion
clion.about: CLion is a cross-platform IDE for C and C++ development, featuring smart code completion, refactoring, and debugging tools.

trello.name: Trello
trello.about: Trello is a collaborative project management tool that uses boards, lists, and cards to organize and prioritize tasks.

android_studio.name: Android Studio
android_studio.about: Android Studio is the official IDE for Android app development, providing tools for building, testing, and debugging Android applications.

kotlin.name: Kotlin
kotlin.about: Kotlin is a modern, statically typed programming language that interoperates with Java, commonly used for Android and multiplatform development.

laravel.name: Laravel
laravel.about: Laravel is a PHP web framework known for its elegant syntax, MVC architecture, and features that simplify web application development.

php.name: PHP
php.about: PHP is a widely-used open-source scripting language that is especially suited for web development and can be embedded into HTML.

python.name: Python
python.about: Python is a versatile, high-level programming language known for its readability, ease of learning, and strong support for various applications.

django.name: Django
django.about: Django is a high-level Python web framework that encourages rapid development and clean, pragmatic design.

odoo.name: Odoo
odoo.about: Odoo is an open-source ERP system that provides a suite of business applications such as CRM, e-commerce, accounting, and inventory management.

windows.name: Windows
windows.about: Windows is a family of operating systems developed by Microsoft, widely used for personal computers, tablets, and servers.
